00058    function getIdFromRef($ref)
00059    {
00060                 if ( is_numeric ($ref) ) 
00061                 {
00062                         return $ref;
00063                 }
00064                 if ( ! is_string ( $ref ) ) 
00065                 {
00066                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::common::getIdFromRef : integer or string expected, got '$ref'");       
00067                 }
00068                 $row = $this->db->getRow("
00069                         SELECT `{$this->key_id}` 
00070                         FROM `{$this->table}` 
00071                         WHERE `{$this->key_namedId}` = '$ref'  
00072                 ");
00073                 $result=$row[$this->key_id];
00074                 return $result;
00075    }
00076    
00082    function getAll($orderBy=null)
00083    {
00084                 if ($orderBy)
00085                 {
00086                         $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table} ORDER BY `$orderBy`"; 
00087                 }
00088                 else
00089                 {
00090                         $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table}";                  
00091                 }
00092         return $this->db->getAllRows($sql);     
00093    }
00094    
00099    function getById($id)
00100    {
00101                 return $this->db->getRow("
00102             SELECT * 
00103                         FROM `{$this->table}` 
00104                         WHERE `{$this->key_id}` = $id;
00105         ");     
00106    }
00107    
00112         function getByName($name)
00113         {
00114                 return $this->db->getRow("
00115                     SELECT * 
00116                                 FROM `{$this->table}` 
00117                                 WHERE `{$this->key_namedId}` = '$name'
00118         ");     
00119         }
00120 
00125         function getByRef($ref)
00126         {
00127                 if ( is_numeric ($ref) )
00128                 {
00129                         return $this->getById($ref); 
00130                 }
00131                 elseif ( is_string ($ref) )
00132                 {
00133                         return $this->getByName($ref);
00134                 }
00135                 else
00136                 {
00137                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::common::getByRef : integer or string expected, got '$ref'");
00138                 }
00139         }
00140 
00146         function getDescriptiveName($ref)
00147         {
00148                 $row = $this->getByRef($ref);
00149                 return $row[$this->key_descriptiveName];
00150         }
00151    
00155    function getAllNames()
00156    {
00157                 $rows = $this->getAll();
00158         $result = array();
00159         foreach ( $rows as $row )
00160         {
00161                 $result[] = $row[$this->key_namedId];
00162         }
00163         return $result;
00164    }
00165

00172         {
00173                 return $this->db->insert($this->table,$row);

00206     function method_getData($params)
00207     {
00208        $itemId  = $params[0];
00209        $result  = array();              
00210 
00211                 // get record
00212                 $itemData = $this->getById($itemId);
00213                 
00214                 // convert to table data model
00215                 $data = array();
00216                 
00217                 foreach($itemData as $key => $value )
00218                 {
00219                         $meta = $this->meta[$key];
00220                         if ( ! is_array( $meta ) ) continue;
00221                         $data[]         = array($key,__($key),$value,$meta);
00222                 }
00223                 
00224                 // return data
00225                 $this->set( "tabledatamodel", $data );          
00226                 return $this->getResult();
00227     }
00228     
00235         function method_create($params)
00236         {
00237                 $namedId                = $params[1];
00238                 $parentId               = $params[2];
00239                 
00240                 // insert new empty record
00241                 $data = array();
00242                 $data[$this->key_namedId] = $namedId;
00243                 $itemId = $this->insert($data);
00244                 
00245                 if ( is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_user") )
00246                 {
00247                         $this->addToRole ( $itemId, $parentId );
00248                 }
00249                 elseif ( is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_permission") )
00250                 {
00251                         $this->addToRole ( $itemId, $parentId );        
00252                 }       
00253                 
00254                 // load and show item 
00255                 $this->addMessage( "qcl.auth.messages.{$this->shortName}.created", $itemId );
00256                 
00257                 return $this->getResult();
00258         }
00259         
00266     function method_update($params)
00267     {
00268         if ( is_object( $params[1] ) )
00269         {
00270                 $data = (array)$params[1]; 
00271         }
00272         else
00273         {
00274                 $this->raiseError("qcl.auth.item.update : invalid parameter");
00275         }
00276         
00277         if ( is_numeric( $id = $params[2] ) )
00278         {
00279                 $data[$this->key_id] = $id;
00280         }
00281         elseif ( ! $data[$this->key_id] )
00282         {
00283                 $this->raiseError("qcl.auth.item.update : no id given!");
00284         }
00285         
00286                 $this->update($data);
00287                 
00288                 $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.{$this->shortName}.updated",$data[$this->key_id]);
00289                 return $this->getResult();
00290     }    
00291     
00298     function method_delete($params)
00299     {
00300        $itemId          = (int) $params[1];
00301        $parentId        = (int) $params[2];
00302        $this->delete($itemId);
00303 
00304                 if ( is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_user") or is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_permission") )
00305                 {
00306                         $this->removeFromRole ( $itemId, $parentId );
00307                 }
00308 
00309                 $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.{$this->shortName}.deleted",$itemId);
00310 
00311                 return $this->getResult();
00312 
00313     }
